body.name: LED Desk Lamp for Home Office, 24W Bright Double Head Desk Lamp with Clamp, Remote Control, Adjustable Gooseneck, Stepless Dimming and Tempering Desk Light for Reading Study Drafting
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 19 hrs 23 mins
features: 💡REMOTE CONTROL & MULTIFUNCTIONAL - This double head LED desk lamp comes with a wireless smart remote control, you can easily adjust the brightness or color temperature by remote control to customize your favorite light! It also has a smart sensing function and a memory function. The sensing function allows you to control the on/off switch using gestures within a 15cm range. The memory function allows the desk lamp to maintain the last used mode and brightness without resetting.

💡EXTRA WIDE LIGHTING RANGE & SUITABLE FOR MULTIPLE SCENARIOS - This desk light features a double-head design with 31.5 inches when unfolded to evenly cover a desk up to 71 inches in width, you no longer need to suffer from lack of light while reading or working! This office light suits artwork, design work, crafting, sewing, reading, drawing, working, drafting, or crafting.

💡STEPLESS DIMMABLE & GOOSENECK DESIGN - Jeagop 24W table lamp supports step-less dimming for color temperature (2700K-6500K) and brightness (10%-100%). The cool white light helps to improve your concentration; The warm yellow light reduces the effect of light on melatonin. The desk lamp is designed with a 360° gooseneck tube and 180° foldable swing arm, and the head can also be rotated 180°, allowing you to move the lamp to any angle to provide the most suitable lighting.

💡CRI≧95 EYE PROTECTION TECHNOLOGY - This office desk lamp has a high Color Rendering Index (CRI) of Ra 95, much higher than most other desk lamps (Ra 80-90), ensuring that the colors you see are as true to life as possible! Its soft and even light source helps to relieve eye fatigue brought about by long hours of watching the computer screen and protects your eyes in all aspects. No glare, no flicker, no blue light hazard.

💡QUALITY SERVICE - Our LED desk lamp is equipped with 144pcs high-quality flicker-free LED light source, good heat dissipation, energy saving and power saving, long service life, and no need to replace it frequently. Don't worry about Amazon's 30-day return mechanism, we are customers just like you, and we offer you a 2-year extended warranty, if there is any quality-related problem, we will provide a replacement or a full refund.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Whether you need comfortable reading light, focused office illumination, or relaxing ambient lighting, Jeagop Desk Lamp makes it easy to light up every corner of your home and meet all your lighting needs!

Customize your favorite light! You can easily adjust the brightness or color temperature by pressing the remote control. 10 color temperatures 2700K-6500K (long press stepless increase or decrease). 10 Brightness Levels 10%-100% (long press for stepless increase/decrease)

Featuring 144 high-quality LED beads, the Desk Light provides continuous flicker-free diffuse illumination that won't cause eye fatigue. The adjustable metal clamp design can easily clip the desk lamp to the edge of the tabletop up to 2 inches, freeing up more table space.

The JEAGOP LED Reading Desk Lamp features a 31.5 inch lamp head with a lamp height of 31 inches and 800 Lm. It illuminates desks up to 71 inches wide, so you no longer need to suffer from low light while reading or working!

Previous page CRI≧95 Adopting high color rendering index LED CRI≧95, accurately presenting colors close to natural light. Eye Protection Soft and even lighting helps relieve eye fatigue caused by long-time viewing of computer screens. Dimmable Desk Lamp Equipped with 24W super bright adjustable LED lights to accommodate your different lighting needs. Smart Memory The memory function allows the desk lamp to maintain the last used mode and brightness Next page 1 Painting 2 Working 3 Learning 4 Drawing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent lighting area
reviews.reviewText: The lamp is very wide, which guarantees a large illuminated area. Furthermore, the light is very bright. Other features that I liked were the remote control and the possibility of changing between different white color temperatures. The mounting bracket is flexible which allows you to direct the light where you need it. It also has a light intensity control so you can choose what is most comfortable for the work you are doing and the time of day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek design and good luminosity
reviews.reviewText: My husband’s office doesn’t get enough sunlight and because of the position of his desk, the recess lighting we have isn’t enough to light up his face well during video calls. These lights are super easy to setup and worked super well for what we needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Light Poor Controller
reviews.reviewText: This is a great light. Gives off just enough light to fill the room or just your desk. But the controller that comes with it is kind of crappy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Do not turn on this lamp without reading the instructions!
reviews.reviewText: If you ever want to use the remote, don't turn on this lamp without reading the instructions! If you don't pair the remote within 10 seconds of plugging in the lamp, you'll have a really fancy paperweight that resembles the remote to this lamp. I made this mistake, and the remote is a dud. There's a chance it's defective, but to replace it I have to return the whole lamp to Amazon and after crawling under my desk and finally getting everything plugged in, I don't want to go through the hassle of returning everything. Learn from my mistake and don't set this lamp up without being ready, within 10 seconds, to pair the remote!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for soft ambient glow or a bright reading light
reviews.reviewText: I chose the Jeagop LED Desk Lamp for my home and I am happy with it.. This lamp has a bright double head design, so I’ve got plenty of illumination for my workspace. The clamp feature allows me to easily attach it to the back of my desk and not take up precious desk space. I also use it for ambient lighting when I'm watching tv on the other side of the room.A useful feature of this lamp is the remote control. I can adjust the brightness and color temperature with a quick touch. The adjustable gooseneck allows me to direct the light exactly where I need it, so I don’t have the eyestrain during long hours of studying and writing..Another feature is the stepless dimming that gives control over the light intensity. Whether I need a soft ambient glow or a bright spotlight, this lamp can do it.The Jeagop LED Desk Lamp is a good addition to my home. Its remote control, and bright double head design made it my top choice for my need for efficient lighting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Provides great localized light - soft on eyes and helps video calls
reviews.reviewText: This is a sturdy light that extends above my monitors and reduces the harshness of the office lighting. I find it is better for my eyes and accentuates my video calls. Relatively inexpensive solution to improve office working conditions. Comes with a remote control that can adjust color and intensity, and it turns on/off with a simple wave of the hand under the light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Soft Desk Light Bar for Great Coverage
reviews.reviewText: This Jeagop desk lamp has a flexible arm, adjustable brightness and color temperatures.I couldn't clamp it in my office work desk, so I placed it in my grandson's desk. The soft even light is easy in his eyes and great for seeing accurate colors on his card collections.I really like the versatility as well as functionality of this desk light. The highly adjustable brightness levels as well as cool to warm kelvin temperature options makes this a very capable desk lamp. The only small negative is that the remote control puck isn't as responsive as I'd like.
